item.title: Examining Runoff Ratio in Santa Cruz Creek Sub-basin
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(janitor) library(ggthemes) library(zoo) library(magrittr) library(gghighlight) library(tsibble) library(paletteer) Santa Cruz Gauge Observed Flow # Read in SC observed flow data sc_usgs_flow <- read_csv("sc_creek_clean.csv") sc_usgs_flow$dis_cfs <- as.numeric(as.character(sc_usgs_flow$dis_cfs)) # Convert date from character to date sc_usgs_flow$date <- as.Date(sc_usgs_flow$date, "%m/%d/%Y") # Create column for daily inflow in cumecs (cfs to cubic meters per second (cumecs)) sc_flow_cumecs <- sc_usgs_flow %>% mutate(dis_cumecs = (dis_cfs*0.03)) %>% select(date, dis_cumecs) Surface runoff calculation Divide aggregated monthly discharge by area (km) to obtain to meters of runoff.
